alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued April 29 at 1:41PM PDT until April 30 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Sneaker waves possible. * WHERE...In Oregon, North Oregon Coast and Central Oregon Coast. In Washington, South Washington Coast. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Waves can run up significantly farther on a beach than normal, including over rocks and jetties. These sneaker waves can suddenly knock people off of their feet and quickly pull them into the cold ocean waters, resulting in serious injury or death.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions. Beachgoers and razor clammers should remain vigilant of incoming waves which may quickly become hazardous.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast
